H0.text: In which play by Harold Brighouse is 'Willie Mossop' employed at a shoe shop. The Game

H1.text: In which play by Harold Brighouse is 'Willie Mossop' employed at a shoe shop. Zack

H2.text: In which play by Harold Brighouse is 'Willie Mossop' employed at a shoe shop. The Northerners

H3.text: In which play by Harold Brighouse is 'Willie Mossop' employed at a shoe shop. Hobson choice

A4.text: The play 'Hobson's Choice' by Harold Brighouse features Willie Mossop as a bootmaker working for Henry Hobson.
